title: Root has 'many more runs to get' after breaking England record
description: Joe Root says there is plenty more to do after he passed Sir Alastair Cook as England’s leading runscorer in Test matches.
excerpt: Joe Root says there is plenty more to do after he passed Sir Alastair Cook as England’s leading runscorer in Test matches.
text: Joe Root says there is plenty more to do after he passed Sir Alastair Cook as England’s leading runscorer in Test matches.READ MORE: Root breaks Cook's record - how he scored his runs
html:
Joe Root says there is plenty more to do after he passed Sir Alastair Cook as England’s leading runscorer in Test matches.

READ MORE: Root breaks Cook's record - how he scored his runs
